item.title: My Father-In-Law
item.description: This post got lost in the draft folder. So I’m posting it about three weeks late. Just for context… Last weekend, my father-in-law, Bruce Tom Tibbett, passed away. It was a difficult thing to comprehend, somebody that we’ve been so close to for so long will no longer be with us. I’m sure I heard it somewhere how Freud describes the death of a parent - it reminds us of our mortality.
